description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in StaxWP Elementor Addons, Widgets and Enhancements – Stax allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Elementor Addons, Widgets and Enhancements – Stax: from n/a through 1.4.4.1.

product.name: Elementor Addons, Widgets and Enhancements – Stax
